definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[נִקְהֲלוּ]] Es 9:2 + 3 t.; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּקָּהֵל]] Ex 32:1, Je 26:9, 3 mpl. [[וַיִּקָּֽהֲלוּ]] 2Sa 20:14 Qr (Kt [[ויקלהו]], cf. HPS), etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הִקָּהֵל]] Nu 17:7, Es 8:11; Pt. pl. [[נִקְהָלִים]] Ez Eze 38:7;—assemble as a  [[קָהָל]]:

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: for conflict or war 2Sa 20:14 (Qr; v. supr.), Es 8:11, Es 9:2, Es 9:15, Es 9:16, Es 9:18; c. [[עַל]] pers. Ez Eze 38:7, acc. loc. Jos 22:12, Ju Jdg 20:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: rebellion, c. [[עַל]] pers. Nu 16:3, Nu 17:7, Nu 20:2 (P), poss. also Ex 32:1 (J; most, unto Aaron).

for religious purposes: to erect tent of meeting, acc. loc. Jos 18:1 (P); hear word of ´[[י]]:, c. [[אֶל]] loc. Le 8:4 (P), [[ב]] loc. + [[אֶל]] pers. Je 26:9; for festival, [[אֶל]] pers. 1Ki 8:2 = 2Ch 5:3; [[לְ]] loc. 2Ch 20:26.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. in i acc. to Ba:NB p. 147); pl. [[וַיַּקְהִלוּ]] Nu 20:10; Imv. ms. [[הַקְהֵל]] Le 8:3 +, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הַקְהִיל]] Nu 10:7;—summon an assembly:

for religious purposes: c. acc. [[אֶת־הַקָּהָל]] Nu 10:7, + [[אֶל]] loc. Nu 20:10, c. acc. [[הָעֵדָה]]([[כָּל־]]) Ex 35:1, Nu 1:18, Nu 8:9, Nu 20:8 (P), + [[אל]] loc. Le 8:3, Nu 16:19 (P); c. acc. [[הָעָם]] De 4:10 De 31:12; [[כָּל־ישׂראל]] 1Ch 13:5, 15:3; elders of tribes De 31:28, of Isr. 1Ki 8:1 = 2Ch 5:2; princes of Isr. 1Ch 28:1.
